Welcome to Trisight’s documentation!¶

trisight.timeT.dt_to_stamp(dt)[source]¶

Transfer date time to timestamp Use example: dt_to_stamp(datetime.now())

Parameters

dt_str (str) – date time, such as ‘2020-09-01 11:15:49’ (%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S)

Returns

transformed timestamp

Return type

timestamp

trisight.timeT.stamp_to_dt(timestamp)[source]¶

Transfer timestamp to date time Use example: stamp_to_dt(1590988249)

Parameters

timestamp (timestamp) – timestamp to be transformed

Returns

transformed date time

Return type

datetime

trisight.timeT.str_to_dt(dt_str)[source]¶

Transfer string format date time to date time Use example: str_to_dt(‘2020-09-01 11:15:50’)

Parameters

dt_str (str) – date time in string format, such as ‘2020-09-01 11:15:49’ (%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S)

Returns

transformed date time

Return type

datetime

trisight.timeT.str_to_stamp(dt_str)[source]¶

Transfer string to timestamp Use example: str_to_stamp(‘2020-09-01 11:15:50’)

Parameters

dt_str (str) – string date time, such as ‘2020-09-01 11:15:49’ (%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S)

Returns

transformed timestamp

Return type

timestamp
